alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 01 at 1:26PM PST until March 01 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Inland Empire above 2000 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers are possible near the foothills in the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
